display_long_description:
# Eggscape: Battle Run (Free to play)
Get ready for the ultimate multiplayer party game!

Eggscape: Battle Run is a fast-paced, chaotic multiplayer party game where players compete in hilarious races, insane battles, and unpredictable challenges. Jump, dodge, blast, and Eggscape to victory in outrageous physics-based gameplay where anything can happen!

**Do you have what it takes to become the most Honorable Egg?** 🥚🏆

**DODGE OBSTACLES, FIGHT OPPONENTS & RACE TO VICTORY**

Race against groups of players through insane levels, survival challenges, and team-based battles across a growing collection of wild maps. Avoid deadly traps, unleash powerful weapons, and outmaneuver rival eggs to claim victory!

**PLAY WITH FRIENDS & JOIN THE EGGVERSE**

Gather your squad and create your own private or public multiplayer party to race, battle, and cause absolute chaos. 

Compete head-to-head, team up, or outplay your rivals—every match is a new adventure!

Survive the madness and cross the finish line before your friends to earn Honor, rewards, and exclusive in-game upgrades.

**BUILD, CREATE & SHARE WITH MASTER BUILDER**

Unleash your creativity with Master Builder, a powerful level creation tool that lets you design and share your own custom levels.
- Build insane levels with platforms, hazards, weapons, and more.
- Share your creations with the community and challenge others to beat your best designs.
- Compete in player-made levels and discover limitless new ways to play!

**CUSTOMIZE & UPGRADE YOUR EGG**
- Unlock hilarious egg skins, emotes, and crazy animations.
- Outfit your egg in legendary styles with fresh cosmetic drops.
- Show off your personality with unique victory dances and wild effects as you claim victory!

**NEW CONTENT EVERY WEEK!**
- Fresh levels, weapons, skins, and challenges drop weekly, keeping every match unpredictable and exciting.
- Surprising twists, limited-time events, and crazy updates ensure there's always something new to explore!
- With a growing universe of dynamic maps, evolving game modes, and the power of Master Builder, Eggscape: Battle Run lets you race, battle, and create in limitless ways.

Join thousands of eggs in the most chaotic, physics-fueled, multiplayer party adventure ever!

🔥 Free to Play. Multiplayer Mayhem. Always Something New.🔥

Are you ready to run, fight, build, and Eggscape the madness! 🏆🥚🚀
